item.title: Book 1:1 Lesson
item.description: Course Types Currently, I offer two types of courses: Trial Course (Free/30 minutes): You can directly schedule a trial course with me. One-on-One Taiwanese Mandarin Class: My courses focus on everyday Mandarin coversations in Taiwan. The price is $15 per hour. If you purchase eight sessions at once, I can provide a 10% discount. Booking I use SimplyMeet.me for scheduling. It is a simple and secure online booking service. You can directly schedule a time slot and fill out the form with your learning requirements and current level of Chinese proficiency.

item.title: Patti - Self Intrdoduction
item.description: Hi! Everyone, My name is Patti, a native Taiwanese teacher. I majored in Chinese literature and I love reading books and go mountain climbing. I can teach: How to speak authentic Taiwanese Mandarin (based on living or traveling experiences in Taiwan) Business Chinese in a workplace setting (interviews, communicating with colleagues and clients) Chinese used in popular Taiwanese dramas, movies, and music, with self-made teaching materials I’m also currently learning Taiwanese and Japanese, I would like to share Taiwanese culture with you.
